properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.enabled
properties.description: Global switch to enable/disable all TestContainers. When set to false, all containers will be disabled and real services from application.yml will be used.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.mysql.enabled
properties.description: Enable MySQL TestContainer. When false, uses real MySQL from spring.datasource configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.mysql.version
properties.description: Docker image version for MySQL container (e.g., 'mysql:8.0', 'mysql:8.0.32').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.postgresql.enabled
properties.description: Enable PostgreSQL TestContainer. When false, uses real PostgreSQL from spring.datasource configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.postgresql.version
properties.description: Docker image version for PostgreSQL container (e.g., 'postgres:15-alpine').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.mongodb.enabled
properties.description: Enable MongoDB TestContainer. When false, uses real MongoDB from spring.data.mongodb configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.mongodb.version
properties.description: Docker image version for MongoDB container (e.g., 'mongo:7.0').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.redis.enabled
properties.description: Enable Redis TestContainer. When false, uses real Redis from spring.redis configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.redis.version
properties.description: Docker image version for Redis container (e.g., 'redis:7-alpine').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.kafka.enabled
properties.description: Enable Kafka TestContainer. When false, uses real Kafka from spring.kafka configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.kafka.version
properties.description: Docker image version for Kafka container (e.g., 'apache/kafka:4.1.1').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.elasticsearch.enabled
properties.description: Enable Elasticsearch TestContainer. When false, uses real Elasticsearch from spring.elasticsearch configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.elasticsearch.version
properties.description: Docker image version for Elasticsearch container (e.g., 'docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.0').

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.localstack.enabled
properties.description: Enable LocalStack TestContainer for S3. When false, uses real AWS S3 from aws.s3 configuration.

properties.name: loadup.testcontainers.localstack.version
properties.description: Docker image version for LocalStack container (e.g., 'localstack/localstack:3.0').
